alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:28AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TODAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... Low humidity, values from 15 to 25 percent, and easterly winds gusting to 15 to 25 mph will lead to near critical fire weather conditions today. Together, these conditions could lead to the rapid spread of fires. Check burning restrictions and fire danger before burning. Humidity will be a bit higher very close to Lake Superior but the wind will be stronger. For more information on burning restrictions for Minnesota, see www.dnr.state.mn.us/forestry/fire/firerating_restrictions.html.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
